name: Randomselection

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random selection
des:
Next time you're trying to make a difficult decision, just ask Alexa for help. At any point, you can say "Alexa, stop" to exit the skill.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
